item.title: Part-Time Voice Actor For Youtube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! 😁

I'm the proud owner of "Just The Facts", a comedic infographic YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCodMmH5lZrXOuM5yc8fA5pA), and I'm currently looking for a voice actor for a new channel im creating.

What I'm looking for:

-  Someone able to complete two to three voiceovers per month.
- Can meet deadlines, with a week's notice provided.
- Comfortable working with an international team on Asana (not through Upwork).
- Open to part-time employment.
- And someone who can deliver scripts in a dry, monotone, and sarcastic tone. similar to the following styles:
https://www.youtube.com/@CasuallyExplained
https://www.youtube.com/@GoodEnoughAnimation

If your interested, I'd love to hear from you! Leave me a message expressing your interest, and I'll be thrilled to share more details about the job.



Budget: $40
Posted On: June 23, 2024 09:12 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Sarcastic Tone, Smooth Voice Tone, Casual Tone, Middle-Aged Adult, Voice Acting, Voice-Over, Male, US English Dialect, Young Adult, Audio Editing
Skills: Sarcastic Tone, Smooth Voice Tone, Casual Tone, Middle-Aged Adult, Voice Acting, Voice-Over, Male, US English Dialect, Young Adult, Audio Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Ad Video Editor Needed for a Quick UGC Ad - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there,

I've got 3-5 new influencer videos that need to be combined with some of our old content and put in a 30s video ad for Meta. I've got an Artist.io subscription that you can choose some punchy music from, and I'll provide all the content in a Google Drive, as well as our old ads for reference.

I need this done in the next 2 days, so please apply if you're available for this quick task. Please begin your proposal with the word dog. I'll send over the content later today and expect the video tomorrow. It's pretty straightforward as I'm looking for a simple video and brand style & examples are provided.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 23, 2024 08:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Social Media Video, Video Advertising, CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Testimonial Video, Social Media Video, Video Advertising, CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Country: Serbia
click to apply

item.title: AI Quick voice cloning audio - Upwork
item.description:
!!!!! THIS IS AN URGENT TASK FOR MY SON BIRTHDAY !!!!
I need someone to edit a video.
the goal is very simple:
change what the person in the video says and replace it with another text: "bon anniversaire Ethan ! Félicitation pour tes 13 ans ! continue de te donner à fond dans ta passion et ce que tu aimes !"
The movement of the lips must also be adapted to the words of the person in the video.


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 23, 2024 08:43 UTC
Category: Deep Learning
Skills:Artificial Intelligence Ethics, AI Development, AI Model Training, AI Model Development, Voice-Over, Audio Production, Audio Editing
Skills: Artificial Intelligence Ethics, AI Development, AI Model Training, AI Model Development, Voice-Over, Audio Production, Audio Editing
Country: France

item.title: Digital Content Creator required skilled in Suno and Runway or similar - Upwork
item.description:
Digital Content Creator Brief: Examples of work product required to lead to larger engagement.

Use: To be reformatted across Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, codebyEdge LinkedIn page,

About codebyEdge:
codebyEdge is a luxury jewellery brand renowned for its innovative technology platform that allows for the creation of personalised and bespoke pieces. Our unique approach to jewellery making celebrates and enriches loving relationships through hidden coded messaging, making each piece not only a symbol of elegance but also a deeply personal token of affection. Praised by royalty, celebrities, and distinguished clients, codebyEdge is more than just jewellery—it's a love bomb that brings tears of joy to the recipient, creating unforgettable moments of emotional connection.

Objective:
Drive brand awareness and sales for codebyEdge, highlighting the emotional impact and uniqueness of our bespoke jewellery. The content should convey that our products bring tears of joy, are instant family heirlooms, each jewel means more due to the emotions captured in the hidden messaging and are the ultimate "love bomb" gift.

Key Messages:
1. Emotional Connection: Showcase how codebyEdge jewellery brings tears of joy and strengthens loving relationships.
2. Uniqueness: Emphasize the bespoke, personalised aspect of the jewellery, making each piece a meaningful gift.
3. Luxury and Quality: Highlight the craftsmanship and luxury of the pieces, appealing to discerning customers.

Content Components:
1. Lyrics: Use AI-generated lyrics to craft a compelling and emotive narrative. See separate attached lyric sheet of examples
2. Images: Integrate stunning visuals to showcase the jewellery and the emotions they evoke. Both lifestyle eg (set on the Amalfi coast, Paris, London, USA etc) and product. (We can supply product imagery for you to use)
3. Brand Messaging: Include the taglines “codebyEdge: Jewellery That Speaks, Your Extraordinary Starts Here, Love Letters Collection.”

Possible Video Outline:

1. Introduction (0-5 seconds)
   - Start with a high-quality image of a beautiful piece of codebyEdge jewellery.
   - Text overlay: "Discover the gift that brings tears of joy."

2. Emotional sung Narration with Lyrics (5-20 seconds)
   - Use .ai-generated lyrics that evoke deep emotions and connections.
   - Example: "Every sparkle, a memory; every piece, a promise."
   - Sing these lyrics over a montage of people reacting with joy as they receive their codebyEdge jewellery.

3. Showcase the Craftsmanship (20-35 seconds)
   - Display close-up shots of the jewellery being crafted.
   - Include text overlays: "Bespoke. Personalised. Perfect."
   - Transition to images of finished pieces worn by models.

4. Highlight Unique Features (35-45 seconds)
   - Use images to show the customisation options available on the website.
   - Text overlay: "Create a piece as unique as your love." Or something of that flavour

5. Emotional Testimonial (45-55 seconds)
   - Short clip of a real or staged customer expressing their joy and gratitude.
   - Text overlay: "The love bomb of all gifting."

6. Call to Action (55-60 seconds)
   - End with a strong call to action.
   - Text overlay: "Shop now at codebyEdge.com and give the gift of joy."
   - Include the codebyEdge logo and website URL.

Additional Instructions:

Music: Choose a soft, emotive background track to enhance the emotional impact.
- Style: Maintain a luxurious and elegant aesthetic throughout the video.
- Hashtags: Use relevant hashtags to increase reach, e.g., #codebyEdge #LoveBomb #LuxuryJewellery #TearsofJoy #BespokeGifts
- Engagement: Encourage viewers to comment on their favourite piece or share their own stories of gifting joy.

Deliverables:

Please give a quotation to deliver an example of your work using the supplied Suno.ai lyrics and acoustic swing

-  Three x 60-second video repurposed to go across Insta/FB/TokTok
- Three  x 15-second teaser clips for Instagram Stories and TikTok etc
- High-quality images for social media posts





Hourly Range: $20.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 08:28 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:Music Video, Testimonial Video, AI-Generated Video, Instagram Reels, Narrated Presentation, Short Video Ad, TikTok Video, AI Audio Generation, AI Music Generator
Skills: Music Video, Testimonial Video, AI-Generated Video, Instagram Reels, Narrated Presentation, Short Video Ad, TikTok Video, AI Audio Generation, AI Music Generator
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
